name: HelpForMenu
sampleUtterances: what do you have to offer me
is there anything you can do for me

messages.content: Some things you can ask me: To escalate an incident say Escalate incident. or to get current incident say current incident. or to get the incidents by status say get incidents by status. or to get the incidents by priority stay get incidents by priority. or to know about the weather say How is the weather. or to lighten up your mood say Tell me a joke. or to end the conversation say Good bye.
